epics.summary: Develop a user account system that allows customers to create, manage, and authenticate their accounts. This includes registration, login, password recovery, and profile management functionalities.
epics.title: User Account Management

epics.summary: Create a system for managing the product catalog, including adding, updating, and deleting products. This epic encompasses product categorization, attributes, and search functionality.
epics.title: Product Catalog Management

epics.summary: Implement a shopping cart system that allows users to add, remove, and modify products in their cart. This includes saving the cart state for logged-in users and guest checkouts.
epics.title: Shopping Cart Functionality

epics.summary: Develop a seamless checkout process that integrates with the shopping cart. This epic includes payment processing, shipping options, order validation, and confirmation functionalities.
epics.title: Checkout Process

epics.summary: Create an order management system that allows users to view their order history, track current orders, and manage returns or exchanges. This epic also includes admin functionalities for order processing.
epics.title: Order Management System

epics.summary: Implement a system that allows users to leave reviews and ratings for products. This epic will include moderation functionalities and display of user feedback on product pages.
epics.title: User Reviews and Ratings

epics.summary: Create a system for managing promotional campaigns and discounts that can be applied to products or orders. This epic includes features for creating, editing, and activating promotions.
epics.title: Promotions and Discounts Management

epics.summary: Develop an analytics and reporting system to track user behavior, sales performance, and inventory levels. This epic will enable data-driven decision-making for the business.
epics.title: Analytics and Reporting

epics.summary: Ensure the ecommerce application is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, providing a seamless shopping experience across different screen sizes.
epics.title: Mobile Responsiveness and Optimization

epics.summary: Integrate customer support features, including live chat, FAQs, and support ticket systems. This epic aims to enhance user experience and provide timely assistance.
epics.title: Customer Support Integration
